The Yellow Thread Society

The Yellow Thread Society is New York’s first (almost) monthly get-together featuring women in games. I founded the series with Chloe Varelidi of littleBits. We’re knitting together a diverse, adventurous and inclusive game community where women don’t need to shout to be heard. People of all genders welcome to attend. Our inaugural special guest was Arkadium co-founder Jessica Rovello. We’ve hosted get-togethers at IndieCade East and the Game Developers Conference.

Visit the Website
